mapper.select: select count(*) from member where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into member (userid, name, pwd, email, phone, writeday) values (#{userid},#{name},#{pwd},#{email},#{phone},now())
mapper.select: select p.*,c.su as cart_su, datediff(now(),c.writeday) as days from product p inner join cart c on p.pcode=c.pcode where c.userid=#{userid} order by c.writeday desc
mapper.update: update cart set su=#{su} where pcode=#{pcode} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select product.* from product inner join jjim on product.pcode=jjim.pcode and userid=#{userid}
